settings.title: Consultation
settings.text:
The Rare Company has years of experience consulting with clients worldwide.

We offer free consultations to help you with the following:

  • Investing in Magic: The Gathering (MTG) art, collectibles, or rarities
  • Professional advice on collecting MTG
  • Selling your MTG collection or decks
  • Information on The Rare Company's appraisal, consignment, deck & set collector fulfillment, and artist brokerage services

We do not offer consultations for non-MTG collectibles or stolen merchandise.

settings.title: Consignment
settings.text:
The Rare Company has a proven track record of auctioning, brokering, and selling valuable MTG rarities. We offer:

  • Years of consignment management experience
  • Cash advances
  • 24/7 client support
  • Free appraisals for your collection

We accept the following items in our consignment program:

  • Mainstream published MTG cards (1993-Present)
  • MTG sealed products (1993-Present)
  • MTG and non-Magic original artwork, sketches, prints, and giclees
  • Artist proofs, altered cards, and pimp cards
  • Misprints, oddities, miscuts, and test print cards
  • MTG memorabilia, artifacts, and uncut sheets

We do not accept non-MTG collectibles or stolen merchandise.
